lighting.title: Smart Lighting
lighting.desc: Smart control of all home lighting, including scenarios, dimming, and automatic scheduling.

climate.title: Climate Control
climate.desc: Central control of air conditioners, thermostats, and blinds for comfort and savings.

security.title: Security & Safety
security.desc: Alarm systems, cameras, sensors, and alerts directly to your phone.

title: Your Home, But Smart
subtitle: Control, comfort, and safety – all at the touch of a button

basic.title: Minimal Smart Control
features: Home Assistant on Raspberry Pi including installation
8 smart switches for lighting (living room, kitchen, hallway, rooms)
2 smart shutter controllers (living room and bedroom)
2 smart AC remotes (IR)
3 door/window sensors
2 motion sensors for passage/security
3 basic automations + phone control

standard.title: Full Family Smart Home
features: Home Assistant on powerful Mini PC
15 smart switches for full home coverage
4 smart shutter controllers
4 motion sensors (indoor and outdoor)
6 opening sensors for doors and windows
Control of 3 ACs via IR
2 IP cameras with remote access
One voice assistant (Google / Alexa)
Dashboard customized by zones and users

premium.title: The Ultimate Smart Home
features: Mini PC i5 + UPS for stable and robust system
20 smart switches including garden, paths, and outdoor lighting
6 smart shutter controllers with combined mode
6 indoor and outdoor motion sensors
8 opening, flood, and smoke sensors for maximum security
5 IR remotes for ACs, TVs, audio
4 cameras with local recording (no cloud dependency)
2 wall-mounted tablets for smart control
2 voice assistants in different zones
Smart intercom system + advanced power monitoring
